projectGridLines.title: GTO-Tech Incubation-PQC
projectGridLines.description:
Develop and implement post-quantum cryptography-based quantum-safe migration solutions for applications

Assess the cryptographic landscape of customer applications and networks, identify cryptographic usage, and create a comprehensive cryptographic inventory.

Evaluate the strength of cryptographic algorithms, business criticality, integrations, and dependencies to perform a thorough quantum-threat risk assessment.

Plan, implement, and monitor the quantum-safe migration of applications and networks, libraries, cryptographic systems, and data.

Evaluate industry tools, contribute to research, and actively participate in industry standardization efforts.


Skills :


C/C++, Network programming, Network protocols (IPSec/TLS), Network security
